usage: Virtual Assistant Page: personalized advice based on user data (Screen Time, HealthKit, Calendar)
Optional: assist in matching students by classes, study/gym preferences

onboarding: Set Preferences (gym buddy, study partner, classes)
main_pages: Home Dashboard: screen time, heart rate, calendar, suggested matches, links to AI Chat + Event Calendar
Student Matcher: filter by classes, gym/study partner preference, schedule compatibility
Match Profile: shared classes/interests, overlapping free times, option to DM/connect
AI Virtual Chat: wellness advice based on user data
Event Calendar: list upcoming events, RSVP 'I'm going/I'm not going', create event page

ai_notes.prompt_example: User data: Screen Time 6h, Heart Rate 90 bpm, Calendar 3 classes + 1 meeting. Provide 2-3 concise wellness or productivity tips.
ai_notes.matching: Optional rule-based first; AI can enhance match suggestions later

team_use.multi_login: Multiple teammates can install the app from Xcode using same Firebase backend; anonymous nickname or email/password login via Firebase Auth
team_use.real_device_testing: Plug-in required only to install/update app; afterward it runs independently

hackathon_strategy.focus: Get MVP working with Gemini API on Virtual Assistant and Firebase-backed Event Calendar
time_saving_tips: Use Gemini API instead of Llama for hackathon MVP
Start with rule-based matching; add AI-enhanced matching if time permits
hackathon_strategy.estimated_time_for_signup: 1-2 hours for Firebase Authentication + SwiftUI login page
